script_name: 查看连接本机的IP地址统计
script:
#!/bin/bash
# Description:  Get Linux 本机被连接的IP Top 5

# Get Data/Time
CTIME=$(date "+%Y-%m-%d %H-%M-%S")
echo -e "\033[33m---------------- $CTIME connect Top 10 ----------------\033[0m"
netstat -ant|awk 'NR > 2  {print $5}'|awk -F ":" '{print $1}'|grep -v "^$"|sort -nr|uniq -c|sort -nr
